post.author: 임기순
post.content:
Global leaders in specialist recruitment
Hays places professional candidates in permanent, temporary and contract positions across all industries. Below is just one of the great roles we are helping our clients to fill:
Application Support Specialist - Weblogic Contract role - 6 months - Rate: $45-50/hr (with flexibility)
Job Description:
Please help spread the word if possible... Our client in Toronto is seeking a dynamic individual with a focused skill set to work within a Payment Systems Support team.
The ideal candidate will have:
-Proven & extensive experience working with WebLogic. -Application support expertise related to QA / Production / DR within Unix environments (preferably Linux). -Ability to move a Windows op. system to Linux environment and expertise installing WebLogic, including conifugration / FTP file transfer and set up of HP monitoring tools. -Experience with SQL Server 2005. -Expertise with scripting tools for automation, monitoring and tuning.
Please let me know if anyone in your network may be suitable / interested. Have any proponents please respond with their resume and compensation expecations ASAP.
Reference # 34078
Lucas Robbins, Business Manager Hays Information Technology Suite 701, 201 City Centre Drive, Mississauga, ON L5B 2T4 T: 905 366 4527E: lrobbins@hays.ca
All introductions will be subject to our Terms of Business.
Specialist Recruitment hays.ca
post.title: Application Support Specialist
